org.drip.product.definition

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.product.definition.Component
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentMarketParamRef
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CalibratableComponent, TreasuryFutures

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentMarketParamRef
    Component abstract class extends the ComponentMarketParamRef and provides the following methods: - Get the product's initial notional, notional, and coupon. - Get the Effective date, Maturity date, First Coupon Date. - List the coupon periods. - Set the market curves - discount, TSY, forward, and Credit curves. - Retrieve the product's settlement parameters. - Value the product's using standard/custom market parameters. - Retrieve the product's named measures and named measure values.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
